title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 5x Bitcoin themed silver 1oz graded coins for auction:LOT 1: 2021 $1 American Silver Eagle "Rip $" #18/50, silver 1oz ICG MS70LOT 2: 2021 $1 American Silver Eagle "Neon" #08/50, silver 1oz ICG MS70LOT 3: 2021 $1 American Silver Eagle "Sun" #26/50, silver 1oz MS69LOT 4: 2021 $5 Canadian Maple Leaf "Mining Club" #27/50, silver 1oz MS68LOT 5: 2021 $2 Niue "Cyber Orange" BTC 1.3mbtc #40/100, silver 1oz ICGMS67*All coins come with coa (and box for Cyber Orange)STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 2nd, 2022, 13:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
